text: James George Stavridis (born February 15, 1955) is a retired United States Navy admiral and the current dean of the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy at Tufts University. He is also chairman of the board of the U.S. Naval Institute. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Military people from Florida Category:Educators from Florida Category:People from West Palm Beach, Florida
title: James G. Stavridis
